title: Royal Pain
description: When Noah's grandfather dies, he finds out that there is much more to this mysterious side of his family than he's ever known―Noah belongs to the royal family of the European country of Evonia. He must decide whether he wants to take on royal responsibilities or keep living a normal life―but if Noah's grandmother has anything to say about it, he'll stick around for true love. Perfect for reluctant readers, this coming-of-age story is laced with romance, mystery, and escapist fun.
author: Raelyn Drake
